text:
FWIW found it on two of my personal PCs, one I built, one a format/install of a
discarded laptop, both Win10 installs. One partition is 499 MB, the other 529
MB. 
---- 
Steve Yates
ITS, Inc.

metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] You may hit a 0x80070643 - ERROR_INSTALL_FAILURE
